name: HZM Coin
public_notice: HZM has recently migrated from their old contract to a new one. Visit this post for more information.

description.en: HZM Coin is a decentralized cryptocurrency built on Ethereum (ERC-20) blockchain. The coin was created with the purpose of global circulation and is intended for use in daily, real-life transactions. The coin is currently being launched on several platforms to help meet the goal of making the currency available to as many users as possible.
